::MC1::
Which best describes computer vision?
{
= An interdisciplinary field for extracting meaning from images and video
~ A field about only storing digital pictures
~ A branch of optics
~ A type of mechanical engineering
}
title: MC1
question: Which best describes computer vision?

choices.text: An interdisciplinary field for extracting meaning from images and video
A field about only storing digital pictures

~ Machine vision focuses only on human biology

}

question: What is the main difference between machine vision and computer vision?

choices.text: Machine vision is more application oriented
Computer vision is only hardware design
Machine vision focuses only on human biology

{
= Image processing -> Transforming images into images
= Image understanding -> Making decisions or scene descriptions from images

= Machine learning -> Approach commonly used in computer vision
}

question: Match the term to its definition.

pairs.right: Making decisions or scene descriptions from images
Identifying objects, people, or actions in images
Approach commonly used in computer vision
